intro: Ready, set, dash! Join the omtastic Om Nom Run 2 challenge and prove you’re the speedster champion.
description:
Om Nom: Run 2 is the exciting sequel to the popular arcade action game, where your main goals are simple: run, avoid obstacles, and race to the finish line!

How to Om Nom run:
• Race through exciting locations - dash through thrilling and challenging maps full of traps and setbacks that will test your skills to the limit!
• Avoid and dodge obstacles - navigate through the course with lightning speed, skillfully avoiding and dodging obstacles that stand between you and victory. Show off your reflexes and maneuver your way to success!
• Be the first to complete the race - feel the adrenaline rush as you outpace your opponents and emerge victorious. It’s not just a race; it’s a quest for glory!
• Find the fastest routes to victory - strategize and discover the fastest routes to secure your place at the top. Unleash your inner speed demon and leave your competition in the dust!

Have you got what it takes to dodge all the obstacles and outpace the competition? Time to find out!
